title: Zinc iso-plating/stripping: toward a practical Zn powder anode with ultra-long life over 5600 h
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3146-3156
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04333A, Paper
Hongli Chen, Wanyu Zhang, Shan Yi, Zhe Su, Zhiqiang Zhao, Yayun Zhang, Bo Niu, Donghui Long
A zincophilic Bi-metal nanosheets guiding iso-plating/stripping strategy is developed to overcome Zn powder anode collapse and achieve ultra-long life.
